description: This file defines an Angular service called AuditService that manages audit log entries. It provides methods to retrieve entries, add new audit logs, and clear logs. The audit entries include timestamp, user ID, action, and optional metadata, serving to track user actions within an application.

classes.name: AuditService
classes.description: An Angular service for handling audit trail entries, including logging actions, retrieving logs, and clearing logs.

methods.name: getEntries
methods.description: Returns a snapshot of all current audit entries.

methods.name: log
methods.description: Creates a new audit entry with user ID, action, optional metadata, and current timestamp, then updates the audit log.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears all audit entries from the log.
